com.bumptech.glide.pngdecoder.pixels

Class PixelsWriterMultiple

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bumptech.glide.pngdecoder.pixels.PixelsWriter
      • com.bumptech.glide.pngdecoder.pixels.PixelsWriterMultiple

  • public class PixelsWriterMultiple
extends PixelsWriter
    Special pixels writer for experimental super adaptive strategy

    • Field Detail

      • rows

        protected LinkedList<byte[]> rows
        unfiltered rowsperband elements, 0 is the current (rowb). This should include all rows of current band, plus one

      • filterBank

        protected CompressorStream[] filterBank
        bank of compressor estimators, one for each filter and (perhaps) an adaptive strategy

    • Method Detail

      • filterAndWrite

        protected void filterAndWrite(byte[] rowb)
        Description copied from class: PixelsWriter
        This does the filtering and send to stream. Typically should decide the filtering, call PixelsWriter.filterRowWithFilterType(FilterType, byte[], byte[], byte[]) and and PixelsWriter.sendToCompressedStream(byte[])
        Specified by:
        filterAndWrite in class PixelsWriter

      • getRowb

        public byte[] getRowb()
        Description copied from class: PixelsWriter
        This will be called by the PngWrite to fill the raw pixels for each row. This can change from call to call. Warning: this can be called before the object is init, implementations should call init() to be sure
        Specified by:
        getRowb in class PixelsWriter

        Description copied from class: PixelsWriter
